titleStmt.title: A defence of the Duke of Buckingham's book of religion and worship from the exceptions of a nameless author by the Pensilvanian.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Penn by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
